title: For Sale:  HK MARK 23 SOCOM 45ACP  NEW!
postcontent:
This is a NIB HK MK23 (V1 DA/SA) 45ACP. Comes with hard case, lock, manual, extra O-rings and two 12rd mags.

The HK Mark 23 Caliber .45 ACP pistol gives shooters match grade accuracy equal to that of the finest custom made handguns yet exceeds the most stringent operational requirements ever demanded of a combat handgun.

The Mark 23 provides this accuracy without the need for hand-fitted parts common in custom-built match pistols costing thousands of dollars more.

One of the most thoroughly tested handguns in history, the MK23/Mark 23 project originated in 1991 when HK began development for the U.S. Special Operations Command, the organization that directs the activities of America's most elite military units, including the Navy SEALs and the Army Special Forces.

On May 1, 1996, the first HK MK 23 pistols were delivered to the U.S. Special Operations Command for operational deployment, making the MK 23 the first caliber .45 ACP pistol to enter American military service since the venerable Government Model 1911A1.

During testing, MK 23 pistols met the most stringent operational and accuracy requirements ever demanded of a combat handgun. Endurance testing demonstrated a service life of over 30,000 rounds of +P ammunition. To meet the reliability requirement, the pistol had to demonstrate a minimum of 2,000 mean rounds between stoppages (MRBS) with both M1911 ball and +P ammunition. All pistols exceeded the 2000 MRBS with an average of 6000 MRBS. In more than 450 accuracy test firings from a precision firing fixture at 25 meters, MK 23 pistols far exceeded the government requirement, averaging 1.44 inches, with 65 groups of less than one inch. There were four groups of .5 inches, with 5 rounds going through the same hole!

The Mark 23 is available in .45 ACP

Features:

Threaded O-ring barrel with polygonal bore profile
Match grade trigger
One piece machined steel slide

title: For Sale:  HK USP9 V1 DA/SA W/Safety Decocker Factory NS's (NEW)
postcontent:
This is a NIB HK USP9 (V1 DA/SA w/Safety Decocker on left side) Factory installed Night Sights. Comes with two 15rd Magazines, manual, lock and hard case.


Originally designed for the American market, the USP (Universal Self-loading Pistol) has found international acceptance as an accurate and ultra-reliable handgun. Features favored by U.S. law enforcement and military users provided much of the design criteria for the USP. The controls are uniquely American, influenced by such famous designs as the Government Model 1911 pistol. All USPs use a fiber-reinforced polymer frame stiffened by stainless steel inserts at areas subject to stress and friction. HK pioneered this use of polymer materials in the production of handguns more than 30 years ago with the development of the VP70Z and P9S pistols.

The USP control lever, a combination safety and decocking lever, is frame mounted and quickly accessible, unlike the slide-mounted safeties common on many semi-automatic pistols.

Using a modified Browning-type action with a special patented recoil reduction system, the USP recoil reduction system reduces recoil effects on pistol components and also lowers the recoil forces felt by the shooter. This same recoil reduction system has been tested and proven in the HK Mark 23 pistol developed for the U.S. Special Operations Command. The USP recoil reduction system is insensitive to ammunition types and requires no special adjustment or maintenance. It functions effectively in all USP models.

The modular design of the USP's internal components allows the control lever function to be switched from the left to the right side of the pistol for left-handed shooters. The USP can also be converted from one type of trigger firing mode to another. This includes combination double-action and single-action (DA/SA) modes and double action only (DAO) modes.

Features:

Corrosion proof fiber-reinforced polymer frame
Polygonal bore profile for increased velocity, easier cleaning, and longer barrel life
Can be converted to any of nine trigger firing modes
Corrosion resistant “Hostile Environment” blued finish
Oversized trigger guard for use with gloves
One piece machined slide made from nitro-carburized steel
Universal mounting grooves for installing accessories

Extended slide release
Patented Lock-Out Safety device

title: For Sale:  HK P2000 9mm V3 Factory Installed NS's (NEW)!
postcontent:
This is a brand new in box Heckler & Koch P2000 V3 pistol chambered in 9mm. It comes with factory installed NS's (Three dot), two 13rd Mags, manual, lock, case and back straps.

The Heckler & Koch P2000 is a German semi-automatic pistol introduced late in 2001 and intended primarily for law enforcement, paramilitary, and commercial markets. It is based around the technology used in the USP Compact pistol, using a short recoil-operated locked breech pistol with a modified Browning-type linkless cam action with a vertically tilting barrel. The P2000 was designed specifically with improved ergonomic characteristics; it has features that reduce the handling related stresses, while at the same time increasing user handling and shooter comfort.

A set of simple-to-install modular grip panels allow the P2000 to be custom-fitted to any shooter’s hand. An ambidextrous magazine release and dual slide release levers make handling the P2000 natural and easy for right and left-handed shooters alike. The 3.66" Cold Hammer-Forged barrel has a polygonal profile while the slide is made from a solid bar of nitro-carburized steel and hosts night sights. Following recent trends in modern pistol designs, the P2000 makes extensive use of impact-resistant polymers to reduce weight, including the accessory railed frame.

title: For Sale:  HK P30 9mm V3 15rd Magazine Factory installed Night Sights NEW!
postcontent:
This is a NIB HK P30 (V3 DA/SA) with Factory Installed Night Sights. Comes with a hard case, manual, lock, grip panels and two 15rd Magazines.


A recent HK pistol design, the P30 is a modern police and security pistol that combines function and safety. Ergonomic features include a special grip frame with interchangeable backstrap inserts and lateral plates, allowing the pistol to be individually adapted to any user. Ambidextrous controls include dual slide releases and magazine release levers.
Variants with a conventional double-action/single action trigger have a serrated decocking button located on the rear of the frame. Variants with HK’s enhanced double action only Law Enforcement Modification* (LEM) trigger have no external decocking controls.

The HK Law Enforcement Modification (LEM) trigger system combines the advantages of a cocked striker component (constant level of trigger pull from first to last round fired) with a double-action hammer system. Using such an enhanced trigger system consolidates ease of use and safety into a convenient, innovative trigger operation—one that reduces the chance of unintended firing. And in case of an ammunition-related failure to fire, all that is needed is an additional second or third squeeze of the trigger without the need of first pulling the slide back to re-cock the pistol. The enhanced LEM trigger system combines the reliability of a double action revolver trigger with the crisp trigger of a single action pistol.

P30S models have an ambidextrous safety lever mounted on both sides of the frame. S models are available in conventional double-action/single action trigger mode and with HK’s enhanced double action only Law Enforcement Modification trigger

A Picatinny rail molded into the front of the frame makes mounting lights, laser aimers, or other accessories easy and convenient. The extractor doubles as a loaded chamber indicator providing a subtle tactile and visual reminder of a loaded chamber.

Extensively tested, the P30 has already been adopted by several European police agencies. Excellent weight and balance make the P30 naturally pointable, easy to control, and accurate to shoot. An open notch rear sight with luminous (non-radioactive) contrast points allows for fast and accurate target acquisition, even under poor lighting conditions.

During a recent (2009-2010) endurance test, a P30 test pistol fired more than 91,000 rounds without any major component failures.
Key Features:

Special grip frame with interchangeable backstrap inserts and lateral plates
MIL-STD-1913 (Picatinny) rail on frame for mounting lights and accessories
Corrosion proof fiber-reinforced polymer frame
Polygonal bore profile for increased velocity, easier cleaning, and longer barrel life
Multiple trigger firing modes available
Patented HK recoil reduction system
One piece machined slide made from nitro-carburized steel
Corrosion resistant “hostile environment” blued finish
Ambidextrous slide levers and
Ambidextrous magazine release magazinev Patented lock-out safety devicev Bobbed hammer (LEM models)
Spurred hammer (DA/SA models)
Automatic hammer and firing pin safeties

postcontent:
Taurus – PT 1911 B1 .45acp - Blued with Rail NIB

Destined to become the standard that all 1911 pistols are compared against, the Taurus 1911 offers you the most accurate and feature-laden model on the market today. Starting with our own hammer-forged -not cast - ordnance grade steel frames, slides and barrels, we machine each and every part to tolerance levels that surpass even today's industry standards. Our skilled pistol smiths hand-fit and tune each gun with the 19 standard features seen below, using quality parts that are built 100% in our state-of-the-art factory. Then they mark the slide, barrel and frame with matching serial numbers. Available in the powerful .45 ACP, this aggressive, rock-solid firearm is ready to go right out of the box. The Taurus 1911 is an unbeatable gun that is also an unbeatable value. Includes pistol, 2 magazines, Taurus security system, barrel bushing tool, bore cleaning brush, manuals, and hard case.

The 2013 Gun Buyer guide list the Taurus PT 1911 B1 w/ rail MSRP for $853.

FEATURES

Taurus Security System (TSS)s: Taurus family of semi-auto pistols now feature the Taurus Security System, which provides instant-ready defense with built-in ability to secure your pistol and make it inoperable at the turn of a key. When the Security System is engaged, the pistol cannot be fired or cocked and the gun's manual safety cannot be disengaged. As with our revolver Security System, the device is part of the firearm and cannot be lost, and the same special Security Key works for both the revolver and pistol Systems (two keys come with each gun). To engage: simply insert the Key into the button on the rear or side of the pistol and rotate one-quarter turn clockwise. This engages the Security System. The manual safety cannot be moved and the trigger cannot be pulled. To disengage: simply rotate the key one-quarter turn back. This releases the Security System, yet leaves the pistol's manual safety in the "safe" position until you are ready to release it yourself and fire the gun.

Accessory Rail: Features the Genuine Picatinny Rail allowing use of many accessories

Build: Forged Slide and Frame

Trigger: Ventilated and lighted trigger with Minimum over-travel

Magazine: 2 - 8 RD magazines with bumper pads

Sights: Genuine Novak® Sights

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

Model: 1911B-1

Finish: Blue

Taurus – PT 1911 SS1 .45acp Stainless Steel with Rail NIB

Destined to become the standard that all 1911 pistols are compared against, the Taurus 1911 offers you the most accurate and feature-laden model on the market today. Starting with our own hammer-forged -not cast - ordnance grade steel frames, slides and barrels, we machine each and every part to tolerance levels that surpass even today's industry standards. Our skilled pistol smiths hand-fit and tune each gun with the 19 standard features seen below, using quality parts that are built 100% in our state-of-the-art factory. Then they mark the slide, barrel and frame with matching serial numbers. Available in the powerful .45 ACP, this aggressive, rock-solid firearm is ready to go right out of the box. The Taurus 1911 is an unbeatable gun that is also an unbeatable value. Includes pistol, 2 magazines, Taurus security system, barrel bushing tool, bore cleaning brush, manuals, and hard case. 

The 2013 Gun Buyer guide list the Taurus PT 1911 SS1 w/ rail MSRP for $966

FEATURES

Taurus Security System (TSS)s: Taurus family of semi-auto pistols now feature the Taurus Security System, which provides instant-ready defense with built-in ability to secure your pistol and make it inoperable at the turn of a key. When the Security System is engaged, the pistol cannot be fired or cocked and the gun's manual safety cannot be disengaged. As with our revolver Security System, the device is part of the firearm and cannot be lost, and the same special Security Key works for both the revolver and pistol Systems (two keys come with each gun). To engage: simply insert the Key into the button on the rear or side of the pistol and rotate one-quarter turn clockwise. This engages the Security System. The manual safety cannot be moved and the trigger cannot be pulled. To disengage: simply rotate the key one-quarter turn back. This releases the Security System, yet leaves the pistol's manual safety in the "safe" position until you are ready to release it yourself and fire the gun.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Glock 21 SS barrel & guide rod, Blackhawk holster, factory magazine
postcontent:
I’ve got a few lightly used Glock 21 accessories available for someone looking to upgrade their gun.  First, a Lone Wolf stainless steel, standard length, match grade .45 ACP barrel. This barrel not only allows you to shoot lead bullets (can’t do that with a factory barrel), but offers improved accuracy over a factory barrel.  This barrel has had roughly 250 rounds through it, and was cleaned after every use.  Second, a Lone Wolf stainless steel guide rod with an ISMI recoil spring set at factory spec.  This provides a longer life, flex free guide rod with the ability to install a lighter or heavier recoil spring.  This assembly has only been used for approximately 100 rounds & is in excellent condition.  Third, a Blackhawk adjustable paddle holster with level 2 retention system.  The release button is located so your index finger is right on the frame (exactly where it supposed to be) when the gun is drawn.  The holster is in excellent condition.  The fourth item is a Glock factory 13-round 45 ACP magazine in very good condition.

I don’t want to sell the holster or magazine individually, just a package deal.  Face to face transaction only.

STI 5.0 Edge 45 ACP

Integrating patented 2011 technology with classic 1911 design, the STI International Edge is a high capacity pistol that carries John Browning’s design into the 21st Century.

Since its introduction in late 1997, the STI Edge has become the undisputed standard for USPSA/IPSC Limited Division competition shooting as demonstrated by Michael Voigt and Frank Garcia finishing one/two as they led the US IPSC Limited Team to victory at World Shoot XII. It has been adopted by SWAT teams, HRT teams, street cops, and law enforcement training sites. It has been embraced by almost all other shooting disciplines.

Built on the patented modular steel frame with polymer grip, the Edge delivers the traditional features of a 1911 and allows the added benefit of high capacity magazines. The innovative frame design preserves the 17° angle of the grip in relation to the slide, original to the 1911. The essential design element for high capacity, the polymer grip, allows for double stack magazines without over-sizing the circumference of the grip, which remains comparatively the same as the circumference of a 1911.

True to 1911 tradition, the Edge has a unique full length slide with front and rear cocking serrations, STI dovetail front sight and STI adjustable rear sight. The Edge comes standard with features such as a stainless steel STI knuckle relief hi-ride grip safety and stainless steel STI ambi-thumb safeties. It comes with an STI stainless steel fully supported, ramped bull barrel.

*New Generation* Model 2013 Thermold 47 Round Magazine for AK-47 and 7.62x39mm AK variants.

These magazines are based on the older Master Molder magazine design re-engineered and updated for improved fit and function across more platforms and newer systems while still maintaining 100% backwards compatibility.

Freshly manufactured out of top quality Dupont Zytel glass-nylon composite in the U.S.A., these tough and durable magazines are the lightest high capacity magazines available for this platform, weighing 6.3 ounces empty. This is 10% less than the 7.0 ounces of the Tapco 30 round AK-47 magazine.

title: For Sale:  L. C. SMITH 20 GAUGE O GRADE W/EJECTORS RARE DOUBLE BARREL
postcontent: Offered for sale is this nice, old, rare L. C.  Smith 20 Gauge "O" Grade double barrel shotgun with ejectors.  The shotgun was manufactured in 1908 and still shows some case coloring on the side plates. Bottom of receiver is shiny however.  Fluid steel barrels show about 85-90 % blue.  The gun has ejectors which adds value.  Interesting though is that the barrels measure 27 inches in length.  Probably were cut, but the gun chokes both barrels as modified.  I did read in the L. C. Smith Collectors info that there were some 27 inch barrels made for some skeet models. Some light pitting in the barrels. Could these be a special order on this gun?  Nicely figured English Walnut stock with no cracks or chips.  Length of pull from butt plate to front trigger is 14 1/8 approximately.  Email with questions.  Shipping will be $40 in a Plano hard case. Payment by Postal money order, please.

title: For Sale:  Used Beretta CX4 Storm .40S&W Carbine
postcontent:
I have a used Beretta PX4 Storm carbine chambered in .40S&W now in stock at The Arms Room. The CX4 comes with a hard carry case, two 11 round magazines(I have brand new 17 round mags available), cleaning kit, an additional mounting rail, and manuals. The rifle is very clean and shows little to no wear at all. I just ultrasonically cleaned it so it's ready to rock and roll. 

The Beretta Storm family was launched in 2003 with the Cx4 pistol-caliber carbine.
This innovative product is accurate, softshooting and easy to accessorize. Today’s shooter demands a gun that can accept a large assortment of accessories, and the Cx4 meets the challenge.
A retractable Picatinny rail extends from the fore-end for mounting tactical lights. Picatinny rails can be mounted on either side (one side rail included) and bottom of  the fore-end for lasers or forward grips. 

This light and compact gun also features a unique patented design that allows the user to reverse ejection and extraction with no special tools or additional parts. Combined with the reversible safety and magazine buttons, the Cx4 is the ideal solution for lefthanded shooters. Length-of-pull can be adjusted with the addition and removal of ½” spacers (one included).

The Cx4 accepts the Beretta family of pistol magazines in various capacities. From the 20 round magazines of the 92 and Px4 pistols, to the 17 round magazines of the .40 caliber Px4, there is a Cx4 configuration to complement every Beretta pistol. 

Come check this rifle out in person at The Arms Room in Fayetteville. If you have any questions regarding this, or any of my other firearms, please give me a call at 479-445-six4eight0. Shipping to an FFL near you is available. Thanks for checking out my listing.

title: For Sale:  Palmetto State Armory AR 15 with Troy Rail, Chrome Bolt, magpul foregrip and laser sight
postcontent:
Selling my Palmetto State Armory AR 15 that has some nice upgrades. I only made it to the range once with this beauty and I put about 150 flawless rounds through it. It is super accurate and a blast to shoot, trigger breaks very nicely. I shot it months ago with plans to go shoot it some more but I just don't make it out enough to have this sitting in the safe so it deserves a better home.

 The gun is all Palmetto State Armory and was purchased as a complete rifle with the following upgrades:

 Chrome Bolt Carrier, Troy Defense Battle Quad Rail (very nice and lightweight), Magpul flip up rear sight, C Products 30 round magazine and a Bulldog Case.

 It has a 1/7 twist 16" chrome lined barrel with flash hider and it is chambered in 5.56x45mm, it is a carbine with a mid length quad rail on it with plenty of room for anything you would want to mount on it, plus a complete set of snap on rail covers in case you want to hold the rifle by the quad rail. It Has a 6 position adjustable stock.

 ALSO INCLUDED BUT IS A MAGPUL FOREGRIP WITH A LASER SIGHT MOUNTED TO THE SIDE OF THE RAIL, THE BUTTON FOR THE LASER IS ON THE FOREGRIP AND IT MAKES FOR A NICE TACTICAL TOOL OR EASY ACQUISITION ON A TARGET.

 The shine you see is a coat of oil I wiped it down with after I cleaned it the last time I shot it, I always put a light coat on my guns before I put them in the safe, the camera flash makes it look a lot shinier than it really is.

 This is a great rifle and I am going to regret selling it one day. I am not looking for any trades but if you have to have the rifle and are offering something nice and attractive I will at least hear your pitch.

location: Fort Myers, South West Florida, Florida
postcontent:
The FNX™ offers all of the features that dedicated handgunners want. The ergonomic polymer frame has a low-bore axis for less felt recoil and improved control. The grip panels are checkered and ribbed for comfortable, no-snag carry. Four interchangeable back straps quickly adapt the FNX™ to fit your hand size. The profiled stainless steel slide has cocking serrations front and rear, and the 4.0″ cold hammer-forged, stainless steel barrel delivers pinpoint accuracy. Ambidextrous operating controls make the FNX™ perfect for competition or personal defense. Includes blow molded carrying case, 3 magazines, cable lock and manuals. Every FNX™ is made in the USA and comes with a factory, none registration, warranty.
The 2013 Gun Buyers guide lists the FNX at an MSRP of $699-$824

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
•Caliber: .40 S&W
•Operation: Double-action/Single-action
•Barrel Length: 4.0”
•Twist Rate: 1 in 16 RH
•Weight: 24.4 oz. empty
•Length: 7.4”
•Height: 5.4”
•Width: 1.55”
•Magazine Capacity: 14 rounds
•Made in the USA

SLIDE
•Stainless steel construction
•External extractor with loaded chamber indicator
•Front and rear cocking serrations

BARREL
•Cold hammer-forged, stainless steel
•Polished chamber and feed ramp

FRAME
•Polymer
•Replaceable steel rails
•Two interchangeable backstraps with lanyard eyelets
•MIL-STD 1913 accessory mounting rail
•Serrated trigger guard

OPERATING CONTROLS
•Ambidextrous decocking/safety lever, slide stop lever and magazine release

MAGAZINE
•Polished nickel coated steel body
•Low-friction follower
•Polymer base pad

SIGHTS
•Fixed 3-White Dot

FINAL COMMENTS

At (SGA) Schuchard Gunsmith & Armory LLC, we will provide 2nd day shipping for free to the lower 48. We can upgrade shipping and also ship to Hawaii and Alaska for an extra cost. 

Please note that for credit card processing, 3% will be added to the total sale. We accept Visa, MasterCard, Discovery, and American Express. We will also accept checks and money orders. All checks have a ten day waiting period. For Florida residents, I’ll have to collect our 6% sales tax as well.

Please ensure that you are legally able to purchase a firearm in your state. We will only ship firearms to registered FFL holders. If you purchase this item, you’ll be responsible for the pick-up and background check at your FFL.

We’ll accept returns only within the first 5 days of pick-up. Buyer will have to cover shipping and add an additional 15% re-stocking fee.

title: For Sale:  CZ82, four Magazines, Dual Mag carrier and 50 rounds of Brown Bear ammo
postcontent:
I have CZ82 for sale, it has an upgraded recoil spring, an upgraded firing pin and firing pin spring (from Wolff). Slide has been refinished and sights lightly painted to add some contrast for easier acquisition.

Gun fires great, have only put about 300 rounds through since I purchased it about 2 years ago. Very accurate and light shooting gun. Recoil is more of a snap, than a kick. Both single and double action, can be carried both Cocked and Locked (ala 1911) or hammer down with a loaded chamber safely, due to it's internal hammer block. The hammer will not go forward and contact the firing pin, unless the trigger is fully pulled to the rear.

This was my carry gun, however I have just recently purchased a CZ75 and have thought about selling this one.

Gun comes with 4 Magazines. All drop free and feed reliably. Comes with a dual magazine carrier, since this was my carry gun, I needed one of those to carry spare magazines. Also comes with 50 rounds of standard Brown Bear FMJ 9x18mm Mak ammo. I will also throw in a Used (but in great condition) KHolster. The holster has a transferable lifetime warranty.

$400 for everything and the holster.


Not interested in trades.

Thank you for your time.

title: For Sale:  Claridge Hi-Tec S9 Pistol New in box
postcontent:
The Claridge Hi-Tec semi-automatic pistols were designed by Ex-LAPD officer Joe Claridge. This unique firearm features a telescopic bolt design encased in a tubular upper receiver with a forged steel frame, button rifled match barrels, and a 16 round hi-cap magazine standard.

In 1990, Claridge Hi-Tec, Inc. was created by Joe and Gail Claridge who incorporated Claridge Hi-Tec, Inc. in Northridge, CA. In 1993 Claridge Hi-Tec was forced to cease operations due to the Government out lawing the guns in the state of California.

The lower receiver/frame is a one-piece machined design integral with the pistol grip and trigger guard. It houses all the firing components and the safety mechanism. The magazine is fed through the pistol grip. 16, 20 and 30 round magazines were made for the weapon, but since 1993 none have been produced. However, re-notched Beretta 92F magazines can be used, and many of those found on the market today are in fact modified Beretta or SIG magazines.

The upper receiver is a one-piece tube with a screwed in match barrel.  All Claridge Hi-Tec firearms utilize match barrels manufactured in-house that are button-rifled.

The S9 was a model marketed as a "sub-compact" (although this is misleading as it is far from being subcompact) with a 5" threaded barrel capable of receiving various attachments. These include a threaded barrel protector, a smooth 3" barrel extension, a ribbed 3" barrel extension, and a shrouded extension. Ostensibly, a silencer could also be attached, but there are none available for the thread type.

Due to its unique "space gun" appearance the Hi-Tec pistols have been used in several movies produced by the major Hollywood studios.
Arnold Schwarzenegger used the GS-9 variant in Total Recall
Mick Jagger used a modified GA-9 in Freejack
Mark Wahlberg used the Goncz High-Tech in Planet of the Apes
A rifle-version was also used by Antonio Banderas in the movie Assassins (1995).
Sam Rockwell as Justin Hammer fitted one or more Claridge Hi-Tec 9mm pistols into the War Machine suit in Iron Man 2

There is no documentation to support this particular pistol was actually used in any of those movies only the type of pistol was. $650

The P220® Carry Elite Stainless is an 8+1 capacity carry-sized pistol with a full-size frame. Chambered in .45ACP, the P220 Carry Elite Stainless features the new Short Reset Trigger or SRT. title: For Sale:  Sig Sauer P225 Barrel-  (or P6) Like new, and Impossible to find!
postcontent: This was purchased new 3 years ago when NOS P225 barrels were found.  Now, they are IMPOSSIBLE to find.  If you have a Sig P6, you may know that the barrel ramp was designed to feed ball ammo, and not hollow points.  The p225 ramp was changed by 2 degrees so US law enforcement could use hollow point ammo.  It will drop right in a P6 or P225 with NO issues.  I put 50 rounds through it with my P6 that I just sold to make sure it fed HP correctly, and it does (and then cleaned it).  Pass up the chance to buy this, and you may not see another for YEARS!  I will ship the item for $6.00, USPS small flat rate box, very well padded.  Asking $200.00 OBO.  Don't throw me lowball numbers, or I won't respond back.  I know what they're worth, and It's probably more than what I'm asking.  Also, I don't need to sell it.  It's only going to go up in value, they aren't made anymore, and haven't in years.  No trades unless a short barrel ar-15 upper.
